title: FPS drop significantly whit the same specs
body: with these few patch update, the fps keep droping. and now i cant play any game in 60fps, and i can't upgrade my mac (you know why), should i quit this game or RIOT GO DO SOMETHING?

replies.body: sad with this need to lower all the thing

You may need to double check a few settings to make sure that your Mac is configured properly for League to run the way it's intended. Check out these steps on our [**Mac FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#section-mac) paying close attention to the Automatic Graphics Switching and the System Management Controller.
